TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionTextItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示智能标记面板上的静态文本项。

span.span: Represents a static text item on a smart tag panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中的单个静态文本项。The class represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel. 各个项相关联在一起以形成一个面板，通过从调用返回组方法。Individual items are associated together to form a panel by returning the group from a call to the method. 大多数情况下，静态文本项用于在一个面板中创建一个信息性的标签。Most commonly, a static text item is used to create an informative label in a panel. 单击静态文本项会导致任何操作。Clicking on a static text item causes no action. 派生的类型通常用于创建单独的类别的标签。The derived type is typically used to create labels to separate categories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

Public Sub New (displayName As String, category As String)

span.span: The panel text for this item.

param.name: category
param.span: 用于组合面板上类似项的类别。

span.span: The category used to group similar items on the panel.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数设置属性设置为`null`。The constructor sets the property to `null`. 详细了解如何`category`参数用于在面板上的项进行分组，请参阅方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233).
